plot outline: The film delineate a striking clash of ego between two brilliant minds that pans out dramatically when an old unsolved murder mystery resurfaces out of the blue. Directed by Debarati Gupta. It features Bratya Basu and Debshankar Halder in lead roles.
title: Kalkijug
